name: The Infiltration of the Dance Machine Robots' Base
name_original: The Infiltration of the Dance Machine Robots' Base
description:
Important: sorry a few bugs, the unity logo screen is blank green, and on level start, and there is a bug on the web build where the player can get stuck for some time at the very start, try moving around, if it doesn't unstick, refresh page to restart, and restart a few more times :( sorry. 

WASD/arrow keys  to move

Mouse to point and shoot

Find and Destroy the robots cmd panel to significantly nerf them.  kill'em & die. Or just die. Or don't ... ??? 

cant jump if pointing directly up or down,

Robots will outpower you, each will single handedly kill you, so no point in shooting robots until cmd panel is found and corrupted. Then kill as many robots with your remaining health. It is decisive you do enough damage, so that even if you end up dying after cmd is destroyed,  your team mates can take over the base.

Play Full screen 

Edit: I fixed some bugs where it was lagging. sound

This is a semi  playable game demo... but still, play it, it work!!! ofc not a finished game, semi finished. w/ one good enough for now first level.
 but i needed more time like 6000 more hours to build the game. by that i mean unity html building, because it takes forever. bug fixing. please game jam overlords, i beg u    :(
